remarks: The collection of finite subsets of a set dominates the set.  (We use the weaker sethood assumption ` ( ~P A i^i Fin ) e. _V ` because this theorem also implies that ` A ` is a set if ` ~P A i^i Fin ` is.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-May-2015.)
statement: infpwfidom $p |- ( ( ~P A i^i Fin ) e. _V -> A ~<_ ( ~P A i^i Fin ) ) $.
